title: HOUR 1 - Joe Burrow, Tom Brady & Darren Woodson
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Joe Burrow, Tom Brady & Darren Woodson
description:
In hour 1 of The Herd, Colin speaks on how Joe Burrow is unfortunately going to have to overcome his situation in Cincinnati. The marriage between Tom Brady and the Patriots are like Rock bands, after 20 years its just hard to stay together. Darren Woodson joins to talk NFL & more

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
